text: The Namdev Koli (also spelled as Namdeo Koli) is a Clan (Gotra, Kutumb) of the Koli caste found in the Indian states of Maharashtra, Goa and Karnataka and the Union Territory of the Dadra and Nagar Haveli and nearby areas. The Namdev Kolis are divided into fifteen subclans and name drived from saint Namdev. == References == == Other websites == *Mahadev Koli clans of Maharashtra Category:Koli clans
title: Namdev Koli
